result.reason: The user is experiencing SSO authentication issues because 'ScriptErrorsSuppressed' is hardcoded to true for the IE rendering engine; making this configurable will resolve the issue while maintaining default behavior.
result.approach: Add a new boolean property 'ScriptErrorsSuppressed' (defaulting to true) to ConnectionInfo and its inheritance chain, and update HTTPBase.cs to use this property instead of the hardcoded value.
